page.title: 10Felixstowe Pier
page.content: At the beginning of the Pier there is an{amusement arcade,}with fruit machines,Penny Falls and snooker tables.The Pier itself is mainly used for fishing,but there is a slide on it and a mini car track.Before the war, the{Pier}used to be three times as long as it is now,but it was hit by a bomb and the main bit was demolished because it was a target for the Germans to land. There used to be another pier as well,down by the{Fludyer Arms Inn,}but it is now no longer there.At low tides you can just see the stumps of it. Just before the start of the Pier, there used to be the{Pier Pavilion, where people went to see shows and concerts.In 1983 it was knocked down and a new swimming complex has been built instead.
